summary: An ordinance relating to applications for, and revocations of, licenses under the License Code; regulating Detective Agencies and Private Detectives; defining offenses; providing penalties; amending Sections 11, 89, and 90 of Ordinance No. 48022 (The License Code); and further amending said ordinance by the addition of five (5) sections, numbered 90-1 to 90-5, inclusive.
